version_description: Bugs behoben und Leistung verbessert
Bugs behoben und Leistung verbessert

- Schiebe Geld und Karten per Drag-and-Drop zwischen einzelnen Pockets hin und her – ganz ohne lästiges Klicken.
- Du kannst jetzt alle ausgehenden Zahlungen mit nur wenigen Klicks erneut tätigen.
- Budgets und Ausgabenkontrolle: Wechsle die Kategorie für eine beliebige Transaktion und prüfe alle Transaktionen innerhalb derselben Kategorie.
- Eine vorhandene Karte kann deaktiviert und aus der App entfernt werden.
- Wenn eine Metallkarte neu ausgestellt wird, bleiben deine Kartendaten in der App gespeichert. Du musst sie also nicht noch einmal aktualisieren, wenn du online shoppen oder ein Abonnement verwalten willst.

- Fehlerbehebungen und optimierte Leistungsfähigkeit.

- Schiebe Geld und Karten per Drag-and-Drop zwischen einzelnen Pockets hin und her – ganz ohne lästiges Klicken.
- Du kannst jetzt alle ausgehenden Zahlungen mit nur wenigen Klicks erneut tätigen.
- Budgets und Ausgabenkontrolle: Wechsle die Kategorie für eine beliebige Transaktion und prüfe alle Transaktionen innerhalb derselben Kategorie.
- Eine vorhandene Karte kann deaktiviert und aus der App entfernt werden.
- Wenn eine Metallkarte neu ausgestellt wird, bleiben deine Kartendaten in der App gespeichert. Du musst sie also nicht noch einmal aktualisieren, wenn du online shoppen oder ein Abonnement verwalten willst.

Prime Cashbacks
A brand new offer on a list of brands that qualify for increased cashback for prime customers.
A customer has two cashback limits: 80€ for Prime Cashback and 20€ for Standard, meaning a prime customer can get up to 100€ cashback per month.

Enhanced Card Security
Customers can now switch cash withdrawals and online purchases ON/OFF in their app settings

Prime Cashbacks
A brand new offer on a list of brands that qualify for increased cashback for prime customers.
A customer has two cashback limits: 80€ for Prime Cashback and 20€ for Standard, meaning a prime customer can get up to 100€ cashback per month.

Enhanced Card Security
Customers can now switch cash withdrawals and online purchases ON/OFF in their app settings

Shared Pockets
A new feature for you and your loved ones using Vivid Money!
• Save money together for any mutual event or goal
• Track and manage household expenses from a shared budget
• Exchange currency in one pocket for a joint trip
• Drag-n-drop your own card to the pocket shared with you

Customers can now provide pocket access to their friends and family (up to five people per pocket). The added users will be able to add funds and spend from this pocket.

Shared Pockets
A new feature for you and your loved ones using Vivid Money!
• Save money together for any mutual event or goal
• Track and manage household expenses from a shared budget
• Exchange currency in one pocket for a joint trip
• Drag-n-drop your own card to the pocket shared with you

Customers can now provide pocket access to their friends and family (up to five people per pocket). The added users will be able to add funds and spend from this pocket.

Split the Bill
Now available for you to use with your friends who don’t have an account with us yet! Not just for Vivid Money customers, but your friends with other bank accounts too.

Privacy Settings
Option to change password is now possible. Customers can now enable and disable Face/Touch ID after their preliminary setup during onboarding.

Split the Bill
Now available for you to use with your friends who don’t have an account with us yet! Not just for Vivid Money customers, but your friends with other bank accounts too.

Privacy Settings
Option to change password is now possible. Customers can now enable and disable Face/Touch ID after their preliminary setup during onboarding.

Subscription Control
This feature allows our customers to track their regular subscriptions and even manage those payments.

Once the app detects a transaction that matches popular online services or regular payment, it will be displayed as such to the customer. If they don't want to be charged for a certain subscription payment that is due, they can "block" it.

Note that Vivid Money won't contact the provider to cancel the service. Customers must terminate their subscription agreements themselves.

Subscription Control
This feature allows our customers to track their regular subscriptions and even manage those payments.

Once the app detects a transaction that matches popular online services or regular payment, it will be displayed as such to the customer. If they don't want to be charged for a certain subscription payment that is due, they can "block" it.

Note that Vivid Money won't contact the provider to cancel the service. Customers must terminate their subscription agreements themselves.

Super Deals, yet another opportunity for you to earn more cashback!

Simply invite your friends to join Vivid Money. When your friends sign up using your referral link, you will receive 2-month access to Super Deals and up to a €50 cashback limit each month whilst each of your friends will get 1-month access to Super Deals and a €50 cashback limit.

The Super Deals cashback is offered on top of the usual cashback you get with Vivid!

Super Deals, yet another opportunity for you to earn more cashback!

Simply invite your friends to join Vivid Money. When your friends sign up using your referral link, you will receive 2-month access to Super Deals and up to a €50 cashback limit each month whilst each of your friends will get 1-month access to Super Deals and a €50 cashback limit.

The Super Deals cashback is offered on top of the usual cashback you get with Vivid!

Smart Authentication
You can login to the app fast and secure. Go to app settings to turn on smart authentication, which allows you to skip biometric login within 15 seconds after unlocking the device by biometry.

Smart Authentication
You can login to the app fast and secure. Go to app settings to turn on smart authentication, which allows you to skip biometric login within 15 seconds after unlocking the device by biometry.

Manage your money with Vivid budgeting

See at a glance where, when, and what you've been spending.
• Everything you buy is automatically divided into categories. You can track how much you spent on a certain category.
• With tags, you can personalize each purchase and track your spending by customized category.

Set limits for categories like shopping or entertainment
• Vivid makes controlling your expenses easy. Just set a limit for certain categories and get notifications when you exceed your planned limit.

Make the most of Vivid Services
Vivid Money is now partnering with selected companies to offer you the most convenient solutions to your needs. You can book a hotel or rent a car right from the Vivid app and get cashback on your purchases!

All you need to do is make sure you visit the “Vivid Services” section in the app and pay using a Vivid card. You’ll find the cashback in your Stock Rewards pocket! Piece of cake.

25% cashback on top brands

That’s right! With Vivid Super Deals you can now get cashback on many new brands that we selected for you!

Here are some of the brands we offer:
LIDL 10%, Lieferando 19%, Amazon 12%, DM DROGERIE MARKT 21%, ALDI 10%, Carrefour 10%, ZALANDO 13%, EDEKA 11%, Otto 10%, KAUFLAND 12%, UBER EATS 20%, SHELL 17%, ARAL 14%, Fnac 10%, TOTAL 17%, Auchan 15%, BAUHAUS 25%, Decathlon 16%, Saturn 10%, E.Leclerc 13%.

Earn 10% Champion cashback at places you love
- Purchase from your favorite places
- The in-app spending board ranks the big spenders of those places
- You’re holding first place? Get 10% cashback on purchases there for two weeks
- Want to stay number one on the leaderboard? Take part in challenges to hold your spot for another two weeks

Live exchange rates
What if you could pay in pounds or dollars without worrying about the changing amount of the transaction?
- Exchange your currencies with Vivid Money, it's easy and free!
- All conversions are based on the live exchange rate, so no bad surprises for you!

Easily protect your money!
If someone got to access the details of your online payment, you can easily issue new card requisites via the app. Simply open your card details, choose the option “pay online” (for your metal card) or open details of your virtual card and click on “Request new”.
You can also divide your money into different pockets depending on your goals and issue a virtual card for every pocket.

Easily protect your money!
If someone got to access the details of your online payment, you can easily issue new card requisites via the app. Simply open your card details, choose the option “pay online” (for your metal card) or open details of your virtual card and click on “Request new”.
You can also divide your money into different pockets depending on your goals and issue a virtual card for every pocket.

Earn up to 25% cashback on your everyday spending
Your cashback is automatically stored in your Stock Rewards Pocket and grows when your chosen company stock increases in value. So all you do is watch your money multiply!

Earn up to 25% cashback on your everyday spending
Your cashback is automatically stored in your Stock Rewards Pocket and grows when your chosen company stock increases in value. So all you do is watch your money multiply!

Delete unwanted pocket and currencies
- To delete the whole pocket, go to the pocket's settings, scroll down and press "Delete Pocket".
- To remove a currency from a pocket, just swipe the unwanted currency to the left in the pocket screen.

Delete unwanted pocket and currencies
- To delete the whole pocket, go to the pocket's settings, scroll down and press "Delete Pocket".
- To remove a currency from a pocket, just swipe the unwanted currency to the left in the pocket screen.

Confirm your online purchases with a simple click in your Vivid Money app!
All you need to do is choose "confirmation in the app" after confirming the purchase on the merchant’s page. You will then get a push notification and you'll be able to find all information about your purchase within the app. Click on ‘Confirm payment’ and the 3D Visa Secure verification is done.

Confirm your online purchases with a simple click in your Vivid Money app!
All you need to do is choose "confirmation in the app" after confirming the purchase on the merchant’s page. You will then get a push notification and you'll be able to find all information about your purchase within the app. Click on ‘Confirm payment’ and the 3D Visa Secure verification is done.

Get an extra-secure card
Your physical card doesn’t contain your card number, expiry date and CVV and your card details are securely stored in the app. Even if you lose your card, your details are still safe.

Control your card in one tap
Need to freeze card operations? No problem. It’s just a click away. Ready to unfreeze? You can do it anytime.

Schedule payments in advance
Don't worry about forgetting to pay your car insurance or any future payments in time. Just schedule when to pay and Vivid will do the rest.

Set up recurring payments
Whether it’s your rent, electricity or other bills, simply schedule recurring payments, lean back and think about the more important things in life.

Schedule payments in advance
Don't worry about forgetting to pay your car insurance or any future payments in time. Just schedule when to pay and Vivid will do the rest.

Set up recurring payments
Whether it’s your rent, electricity or other bills, simply schedule recurring payments, lean back and think about the more important things in life.

Pay safer and faster using your Vivid card with Apple Pay
Add your Vivid metal card to Apple Pay to make fast and secure payments with your iPhone or Apple Watch. Spending money shouldn’t mean spending more time at the register or entering your card details online or in your app.

On iPhone, open the Wallet app and tap the “+” sign.
On Apple Watch, open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone and select “Wallet and Apple Pay”. Then tap “Add Credit or Debit Card”.

Pay safer and faster using your Vivid card with Apple Pay
Add your Vivid metal card to Apple Pay to make fast and secure payments with your iPhone or Apple Watch. Spending money shouldn’t mean spending more time at the register or entering your card details online or in your app.

On iPhone, open the Wallet app and tap the “+” sign.
On Apple Watch, open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone and select “Wallet and Apple Pay”. Then tap “Add Credit or Debit Card”.

Introducing the Invest Feed
Now, you can get all your financial news and education directly from the Vivid app. From market updates to news and simple explainers of financial concepts, our editorial team will make you a more confident investor.

Introducing the Invest Feed
Now, you can get all your financial news and education directly from the Vivid app. From market updates to news and simple explainers of financial concepts, our editorial team will make you a more confident investor.

Transfer directly to your contacts
Send, receive, or request money instantly just by phone number.
